thread.title: QuisLex Leadership to Attend ACC Value Challenge Roundtable and Champion Award Dinner
thread.title_full: QuisLex Leadership to Attend ACC Value Challenge Roundtable and Champion Award Dinner

author: Philip Algieri
title: QuisLex Leadership to Attend ACC Value Challenge Roundtable and Champion Award Dinner
text:
QuisLex announced today that it will join the 2015 ACC Value Champions at the Association of Corporate Counsel (“ACC”) Annual Meeting in Boston. The event will be held at 4:00 PM EDT on Sunday, October 18, 2015 at the Sheraton Boston Hotel. The ACC Value Challenge Roundtable is exclusively for ACC Value Champions and members of the ACC Value Challenge Steering Committee. “QuisLex and ACC Value Champions like VMware share a keen focus on legal process excellence and measurable quality. This focus and collaboration can enable breakthrough results in transforming legal operations,” says QuisLex CEO Ram Vasudevan.
QuisLex’s value as a partner in transforming contract management operations was noted by VMware’s Aine Lyons, Vice President & Deputy General Counsel, Worldwide Legal Operations in the ACC’s profile of the 2015 Value Champions. Ms. Lyons will join the other 2015 Value Champions on the “Legal Operations Professionals Share Strategies and Tactics to Improve the Value of Legal Services” panel (Track 201) on Monday, October 19 at 11 AM. The panel is part of the ACC Value Champions Series at this years’ ACC Annual Meeting. Details can be found on the Annual Meeting Website .
About the ACC Value Champions:
The ACC Value Champions, a component of the ACC Value Challenge, is a unique recognition program that identifies, celebrates and publicizes successful law department value initiatives and collaborations between clients and their legal service providers. Each year ACC identifies and highlights individuals who have effectively utilized value practices to drive change within their departments by cutting spending, improving predictability and achieving better outcomes. Our Champions this year come from varied industries and departments/firms of many sizes, and have utilized exceptional approaches to drive value. The profiles presented here tell the stories of how the "Champs" results were achieved, in hopes their ideas and tactics will be adopted by others.
About QuisLex:
QuisLex is an award-winning legal services provider specializing in executing complex document review, contract management, and compliance projects for leading corporations and law firms throughout the world. QuisLex has reviewed over three billion pages in support of litigations and investigations, and drafted, negotiated, and reviewed hundreds of thousands of contracts in connection with compliance initiatives, M&A due diligence, and contract lifecycle management. For more information, please visit http://www.quislex.com .
